msgs.missingFieldVar: The field {{fieldName}} is missing the variable {{variable}}
msgs.noFileExt: Could not detect the file extension
msgs.noBackgroundId: Could not detect the background identity
msgs.noPreviewId: Could not detect the preview identity
msgs.keyMismatch: The system generated non-matching keys {{key1}} and {{key2}} when extracking the background and preview identities.  Something isn't right with the $t(page.settings.regExPreviewKey) value.
msgs.duplicateNames: The system generated a background and preview image with the same name.  Please make sure $t(page.settings.regExPreviewKey) is not just #KEY#

dash.greet: What would you like to accomplish?
dash.about: To Desktop Tour Station, an app for creating and editing tours for Mobile VR Station.

action.processTitle: Run through your choices and add content

titles.location: Please choose a location to save and load your tours from.  Please ensure you have enough free space to store your tours and read and write permission.
titles.regExInfo: We use regular expression to help link backgrounds to their previews.  We don’t want to impose an exact format so you’re free to modify our expressions used to name and detect images.  If you do change this, previous projects will be impacted.
titles.backEx: This expression is used to locate background images.
titles.previewEx: This expression is used to locate preview images that are tied to a background.
titles.previewKey: This is used to test out expression changes. This should be a filename that would come from your camera.
titles.sample: This value is used to generate the preview file name. It should contain the string #KEY#.

tabs.roomTitle: Create and edit rooms.  Rooms are where you tour can take you.
tabs.pointTitle: Create and edit points.  Points are what you can interact with.
tabs.presetTitle: Create and edit presets.  Presets define how content should be displayed.

action.addMissing: Automaticlaly add missing rooms.  If you just added more files, hit this to fill in new content.
action.addExits: Automatically add exits to every room
action.changeTitle: Change the currently selected rooms background and preview image.
action.pointLinkRoom: Link Rooms, creates a two way link
action.pointToRoom: To Room, creates a one way link
action.pointNew: New Point, empty point, has no purpose yet

field.roomIdentityTitle: The backend name for this room
field.roomNameTitle: The human friendly name for this room
